Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-31852 affecting package llvm for versions less than 18.1.2-3
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-31852 affecting package llvm for versions less than 18.1.2-3. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package llvm is earlier than 18.1.2-3, affected by CVE-2024-31852
